channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 03:42 Air alert in Zaporizhzhya region. Stay tuned for further messages.
item.description: 🔴 03:42 Air alert in Zaporizhzhya region. Stay tuned for further messages. #Запоризька_область This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.
